page.title: 11Housing
page.content: Clayton and Queensbury are good areas for buying and selling houses because its a Semi Rural area, and young people are going in for terraced houses in Clayton and Queensbury because morgages are low for first time buyers. The most popular houses are Cottages,and terraced because they can do them up, and old people are going in for smaller houses, no there has no houses being built in the last two years. There are leaving the shell of the house and making them into made houses inside. What the most expensive in Clayton and Queensbury there not so expensive they are low mortgage because its not so near to town the closer to town the more mortgage you have to pay.
